text: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates, Co-founder of Microsoft

text: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat.
author: Sheryl Sandberg, CEO of Lean In.

text: You can't have everything you want, but you can have the things that really matter to you.
author: Marissa Mayer, President and CEO of Yahoo!

text: If you don't innovate fast, disrupt your industry, disrupt yourself, you'll be left behind.
author: John Chambers, CEO of Cisco

text: Customers should be number one, Employees number two, and then only your Shareholders come at number three.
author: Jack Ma,  Founder, Alibaba

text: Taking care of your employees is extremely important and very, very visible.
author: Larry Ellison, Founder of Oracle

text: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
author: Ginni Rometty, CEO of IBM

text: Keep going forward because success will come
author: Cassandra Sanford, CEO Kelly Mitchell Group

text: Engineering is the closest thing to magic that exists in the world
author: Elon Musk, founder of SpaceX, Tesla and PayPal

text: Our industry does not respect tradition — it only respects innovation.
author: Satya Nadella, CEO of Microsoft
